image_1.description: Mustard is a yellow condiment used in various French dishes, including steak frites and grilled sausages, and is considered indispensable in French cuisine. Its scarcity has caused a national debate and emotional response in France, as highlighted by the article discussing the cultural impact of mustard in the country.

image_2.description: The interior of a building with high ceilings and marble floors, likely a government building, as described in the context of the U.S. Capitol where Hershel Williams lay in honor.

image_4.description: Ivana Trump was the former wife of Donald J. Trump, a Czech American businesswoman, and part of the 1980s New York power couple. She passed away at the age of 73.
Donald J. Trump is the former president and part of the 1980s New York power couple with Ivana Trump. He announced Ivana Trump's death.

image_5.description: Mario Draghi, the Prime Minister of Italy, is a man dressed in a dark suit and blue tie, seated on an ornate golden chair with a red upholstered background, appearing to be in a formal setting such as a parliament or legislative assembly. He recently offered to quit but had his resignation refused by the country's president, leaving Italy in political limbo.
